mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_test_tab (order_id, order_name, order_status, order_content, add_time) VALUE(#{orderId}, #{orderName}, #{orderStatus}, #{orderContent}, #{addTime})

INSERT INTO order_test_tab (order_id, order_name, order_status, order_content, add_time) VALUES
(#{item.orderId}, #{item.orderName}, #{item.orderStatus}, #{item.orderContent}, #{item.addTime})
